alert.note: Alert for Kossuth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Kossuth County through 745 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Algona, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Algona, West Bend, Burt, Whittemore, Wesley, Corwith, St. Benedict, Irvington, Sexton, Algona Municipal Airport, Stinson Prairie State Park and Aa Call State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Iowa.
